attributes.additional_details: you have been torturing me for 2 years I lot my hearing and eye sight you refuse to stop Georgians abusing me none stop 24 hours a day 7 days a week for 16 months police has done nothing.  I am in pain for 24 hours Georgians wont leave me alone you are not arresting them.  robberies attacks attacks verbally and phisaclly threats none stop pecace deprevation utter torture can you imagine what you are doing and there for what you really are as you are letting it go on for this long.  mutilation I am glad you are suffering Georgian message to me. I mean you must have all lost mind maybe you wont approve it but read it. they raped 2 girls till death while fighting for freedom and you managed to mutilate one girl for no reason for letting this happen.
